bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Information
bioghist.p: The University of Virginia Hospital was cited for violations by the U.S. Atomic Energy Commission during the 1960s. These papers illuminate the violations and how the violations were corrected.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Letters, memos, applications for the use of radioactive materials with human subjects.
